mapper.select:
select fdi.user_info_user_info_id_2 , fdi.deep_analysis_unlocked , fdi.aging_parts , fdi.impression_age , fdi.face_detection_info_id , fdi.upload_image_resource_key , ui.phone_number , ui.member_level_id , ui.avatar_resource_key , fdi.custom_plan_unlocked , ui.password , ui.email , ui.username
,upload_image.resource_id as upload_image_resource_id ,upload_image.resource_name as upload_image_resource_name ,upload_image.resource_path as upload_image_resource_path ,upload_image.related_table_name as upload_image_related_table_name ,upload_image.related_table_key as upload_image_related_table_key ,upload_image.relate_table_column_name as upload_image_relate_table_column_name
FROM face_detection_info fdi left join user_info ui on fdi.user_info_user_info_id_2 = ui.user_info_id left join (select resource_id, resource_name, resource_path, related_table_name, related_table_key, relate_table_column_name from static_resources where related_table_name='face_detection_info' and relate_table_column_name='upload_image' ) as upload_image on upload_image.related_table_key=fdi.face_detection_info_id
${ew.customSqlSegment}

select fdi.user_info_user_info_id_2 , fdi.deep_analysis_unlocked , fdi.aging_parts , fdi.impression_age , fdi.face_detection_info_id , fdi.upload_image_resource_key , ui.phone_number , ui.member_level_id , ui.avatar_resource_key , fdi.custom_plan_unlocked , ui.password , ui.email , ui.username
,upload_image.resource_id as upload_image_resource_id ,upload_image.resource_name as upload_image_resource_name ,upload_image.resource_path as upload_image_resource_path ,upload_image.related_table_name as upload_image_related_table_name ,upload_image.related_table_key as upload_image_related_table_key ,upload_image.relate_table_column_name as upload_image_relate_table_column_name
FROM face_detection_info fdi left join user_info ui on fdi.user_info_user_info_id_2 = ui.user_info_id left join (select resource_id, resource_name, resource_path, related_table_name, related_table_key, relate_table_column_name from static_resources where related_table_name='face_detection_info' and relate_table_column_name='upload_image' ) as upload_image on upload_image.related_table_key=fdi.face_detection_info_id
${ew.customSqlSegment}

select fdi.user_info_user_info_id_2 , fdi.deep_analysis_unlocked , fdi.aging_parts , fdi.impression_age , fdi.face_detection_info_id , fdi.upload_image_resource_key , ui.phone_number , ui.member_level_id , ui.avatar_resource_key , fdi.custom_plan_unlocked , ui.password , ui.email , ui.username
,upload_image.resource_id as upload_image_resource_id ,upload_image.resource_name as upload_image_resource_name ,upload_image.resource_path as upload_image_resource_path ,upload_image.related_table_name as upload_image_related_table_name ,upload_image.related_table_key as upload_image_related_table_key ,upload_image.relate_table_column_name as upload_image_relate_table_column_name
FROM face_detection_info fdi left join user_info ui on fdi.user_info_user_info_id_2 = ui.user_info_id left join (select resource_id, resource_name, resource_path, related_table_name, related_table_key, relate_table_column_name from static_resources where related_table_name='face_detection_info' and relate_table_column_name='upload_image' ) as upload_image on upload_image.related_table_key=fdi.face_detection_info_id
where fdi.face_detection_info_id = #{id}
